item.title: Trump faces influence test at Mar-a-Lago with warring House GOP factions: 'How do we move forward?'
item.description: House Republicans who President-elect Donald Trump summoned to Mar-a-Lago this weekend are hoping to reconcile their own agenda with his.

item.title: Republicans blast 'joke' sentencing of Trump 10 days before swearing in
item.description: President-elect Trump was sentenced for falsifying records just 10 days before he is set to take office.
